name: 数据的分离和查询 -- @1.1 设备注册

steps.name: Given 用例编号数据分离001和用例描述设备数据分离: 设备(一体机)注册和查询

When 数据制造: 接口{"接口名": "设备注册", "请求方法": "POST", "url": r"/aiot-device/v1/mac/api/kas/device-register"}, api账号{"api_key": "ugp1zdjvhfsht16a", "api_secret": "0eb9trdq29yj8q7ruc0nrokm4obstd7s"}, 请求参数{"deviceId": "0120100016c0aa04a00", "productId": "61b1beb3d256694905d12221"}, 期望值{"code": 200, "msg": "设备注册成功"}

Then 数据查询: 接口{"接口名": "设备查询", "请求方法": "GET", "url": r"/aiot-device/v1/mac/api/kas/device-list"}, 本api账号, 请求参数{"deviceId": "0120100016c0aa04a00", "deviceType": "AIO_MACHINE", "uid": "", "current": 1, "size": None, "productId": "61b1beb3d256694905d12221"}, 预期{"code": 200, "msg": "设备列表查询成功", "totalCount": 1}
Then 同空间异api账号{"api_key": "98h35f4e50xoe6m4", "api_secret": "k30oyz58fb7j0sfx4iaqa8n0s3vmiivj"}查询: 参数同上, 预期{"code": 200, "msg": "设备列表查询成功", "totalCount": 1}
Then 同租户异空间的api账号{"api_key": "150qw761lcolwssc", "api_secret": "b9vrjzvg1dorejp1d4rw1ad7rr3mknx8"}查询: 参数同上, 预期{"code": 200, "msg": "设备列表查询成功", "totalCount": 0}
Then 异租户的api账号{"api_key": "uafpktjevv9pebcl", "api_secret": "nvs1gb3lct3fxy4ji4xzarxs7zt3nwxc"}查询: 参数同上, 预期{"code": 200, "msg": "设备列表查询成功", "totalCount": 0}

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: 设备数据分离: 设备(一体机)注册和查询

fullName: 数据查询和数据分离: 数据的分离和查询
